name: Flying Police Car Simulator 3d games
description:
Flying Police Car Simulator 3d games

Do you love police car driving games. Want to drive and fly with a flying police car? Flying Police Car: San Andreas is perfect for you!
Get ready to the thrilling cop car driving experience! You can test your airplane pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time. Fly
your plane around the city try to chase down criminals, Drive your police car do stunts and drifts !

Flying Car Free: Police Chase is made for all fans of police games, free car driving games, Simulation games and Airplane Flight games..

key features:

=> Improve Airplane Flight Ability
=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> Beautiful Mountains and islands
=> Realistic and dynamic auto physics
=> Easy and Free to use
